attributes.action: Demand Theresa May resigns as Prime Minister.
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May dodges questions prompting her to condemn Trump's recent Muslim ban at their joint press conference: http://uk.businessinsider.com/theresa-may-critisied-for-not-condemning-donald-trump-muslim-ban-2017-1

Theresa May is pictured holding hands with newly-elected Donald Trump: 
http://metro.co.uk/2017/01/28/theresa-may-and-donald-trump-held-hands-and-everyones-grossed-out-6411388/
attributes.background: After her joint press conference with Donald Trump where she failed to uphold the UK's open-minded, multi-cultural views, and pictures of her embracing Trump were revealed recently, I'm demanding a petition be put forward demanding May stands down as PM. It worked in Iceland, it can work here.

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178727
